neuter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a neuter noun, pronoun etc belongs to a class of words that have different inflections from masculine or feminine words
neuter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to remove part of the sex organs of an animal so that it cannot produce babies
neuter.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to remove power from something or to stop something from being effective â€“ used to show disapproval
neuter.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Plans to reform local government are designed to neuter local democracy.
